title: Mass Spectrometry Research Group

description:
A Map by Kkmurray

Locations of research groups in mass spectrometry - academic, government, and industry.

properties.description: Posted by KkmurrayEdmonton, Alberta, Canada Prof. Liang Li\'s group is based in the Chemistry Department of the University of Alberta. U of A is located in beautiful Edmonton, Alberta, Canada.

properties.name: Mass Spectrometry at Nordvuluk
properties.description: Posted by KkmurrayReykjavík, IcelandNordvulk runs a Nu-Instrument double focusing multicollector mass spectrometer with a plasma source.
